title: FFBE x WOTV FFBE Release Campaign

context.text:

The number of new players in FFBE as well as those who return to the game after a hiatus during the campaign period will determine the rewards given to players of both games! â–¼ Campaign Period 00:00, 4/13/2020 â€“ 20:00, 4/28/2020, World Time (PST) By reaching Milestone 5, all players will receive the **MR unit Fina, one A-type MR+ Guaranteed Unit Summon Ticket, and 500 Visiore**! title: Rally Your Guild Members and Aim for Victory! Guild Battles Have Arrived!

context.text:
Ready your teams! The long-awaited **Guild Battles** are here! __**Duration**__ â—† Commences 4/15/2020, World Time (PST) Matching Phase: 11:00â€“12:59, World Time (PST) Battle Phase: 13:00â€“22:59, World Time (PST) Ranking Confirmation Start Time: 23:00, World Time (PST) *Guild Battle Reward Claim Period: from the moment rankings are confirmed until the start of the Matching Phase the following day. *Guild Battles will be hosted daily except on days when server maintenance will be needed.

__**Guild Battles Have Arrived!**__

â—† Only guilds with **10 or more members** can participate. Guilds will be automatically entered into the matching algorithm and paired with opponents **every day from 11:00 to 12:59, World Time (PST)**. â—† Battles with opposing guilds take place from **13:00 to 22:59, World Time (PST)**; whichever guild has earned more stars by the end of the Battle Phase will be deemed the victor. *From the start of the Matching Phase until post-battle rankings have been confirmed, the following acts are prohibited. ``` ãƒ» New members can join the guild, but they are not allowed to participate in that day's Guild Battle. ãƒ» The guild cannot be disbanded. ``` __**Prepare Your Guild for Battle!**__ Each guild member sets up an Attack Party and Defense Party to use in battle.

*Any formation changes made between the end of the Matching Phase and the end of the Battle Phase will not be applied during battles. 
 

Guild Leaders and Sub Leaders get to prioritize which members go on the defensive. 

â—† Priority Editing Period
**From after receiving ranking rewards to 11:00, World Time (PST) (start of the Matching Phase)**

*In the event that the opposing guild has fewer members than your own, members with high priority for defense will be set as the primary Defense Parties. 

The Battle Phase Has Begun! Attack the Opposing Guild!

ãƒ»** Attack Parties can do battle twice in certain situations.** ãƒ» If your Attack or Defense Party remains standing after battle, your party's HP, AP, TP, and remaining ability uses will be carried over to the next battle. *Attack Parties cannot do battle again if they are wiped out after their first battle. ``` Hint: No matter how strong an opposing guild is, if you can whittle them down, you can still claim victory! ``` ãƒ» You'll earn stars for every unit downed by attacking the opposing guild's Defense Party. ``` You'll receive personal rewards in the form of a set number of Guild Medals based on how many stars you've earned. ``` ãƒ» You can receive Guild Medals by attacking. Also, even if it looks like you're not going to win your battle, by attacking you can reveal valuable information about the opposing Defense Party to your fellow guild members, which can greatly contribute to your guild's overall victory. ãƒ» An opposing guild's Defense Party initially only displays the first unit; but once they are attacked, all units of the party are revealed. *Draws may occur due to the limitation on the number of actions that can be performed during battle, leaving both the Attack and Defense Parties remaining standing. However, in such an event, the same two parties will not carry over to the next battle. ã€€``` Hint: Coordinating with your guild members is crucial! ``` When the Battle Phase ends, the victor will be decided by whichever guild has earned more stars. Also, you'll receive Guild Medals based on you and your guild's cumulative battle performance. You can acquire more Guild Medals as your Guild League improves, so work together with your guild members to reach the top! __**Guild Battle Rewards**__

The following rewards can be acquired from Guild Battles. â—† Personal Rewards You can acquire at least one Guild Medal for participating and as many as six Guild Medals for doing battle twice during the Battle Phase. â—† Guild Rewards (distributed to all members) Every guild member will receive a number of Guild Medals based on how many stars the entire guild acquired during the Battle Phase.

Thank you for playing WAR OF THE VISIONS FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS. The WOTV FFBE development and operations team would like to extend our deepest sympathies to those who have been affected by COVID-19 in any shape or form as the virus continues to spread worldwide. Currently we are doing our best to continue servicing our game as usual, but we feel obligated to share with you that unfortunately some of the contents scheduled for future release may be affected due to the current situation at hand. While we are taking all precautions necessary to ensure the safety of our team members, we are doing so in whatever ways least affect the game's operation. However, in the event that the game or its contents are indeed affected, we will endeavor to release a statement via the in-game notices and our official social media channels as soon as possible. We thank you for your understanding and humbly ask for your patience regarding this matter. - The WAR OF THE VISIONS FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS Team

title: Notice of Delays and Bugs (Added 03:00, 4/1/2020, World Time (PST))

context.text:
Compensatory gifts have been distributed to players after the following bugs occurred. Check your Present Box for details. 1. Players who logged in could not receive their regular Login Bonuses. We have distributed the Day 1 Login Bonus to players who logged in between 00:00, 4/1/2020 and 00:47, 4/1/2020, World Time (PST). Login Bonuses for Day 2 and onward should be regularly receivable. (Date and time of distribution: 11:00, 4/1/2020, World Time (PST)) 2. Players who enhanced their Guild Statues were unable to clear Daily Missions pertaining to Guild Statue enhancement. We have distributed the relevant Daily Mission rewards to players who enhanced Guild Statues between 00:00, 4/1/2020 and 00:47, 4/1/2020, World Time (PST). (Date and time of distribution: 10:43, 4/1/2020, World Time (PST)) Thank you for your understanding, and please accept our apologies for the inconveniences caused.
â–  Notice of Delays and Bugs Due to technical issues, all limited events, summons, shops, etc. scheduled to be available from 00:00, 4/1/2020, World Time (PST), have been delayed. As a result of the aforementioned issues, players reported having the following problems between 00:00, 4/1/2020 and 00:47, 4/1/2020, World Time (PST), when emergency maintenance began. ``` 1. Players who logged in could not receive their regular Login Bonuses. 2. Players who enhanced their Guild Statues were unable to clear Daily Missions pertaining to Guild Statue enhancement. 3. Unit Bonuses were not applied for players who had commenced Chocobo Expedition. 4. Monthly Mission counts were not accurately accounted for. ``` We are currently investigating the matter and will make further announcements accordingly. To all our devoted players, we deeply apologize for the inconveniences caused. *We have scheduled to provide compensation to all players at a later date.

The following compensation for the emergency maintenance that occurred on 4/1/2020, World Time (PST) has been delivered to your Present Box. title: [WOTV FFBE Notice] Regarding Adjustments to Esper Resonance

context.text: Regarding Adjustments to Esper Resonance Thank you for playing WAR OF THE VISIONS FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS. The following adjustments were made at 00:00, 4/1/2020, World Time (PST). Specifics â–  Adjustments to Esper Resonance Previously, if an esper was unequipped from a unit before embarking on a Quest, its Resonance with that unit would gradually decrease. This has been adjusted so that Resonance, once raised, will no longer decrease. *An esper's Resonance with each unit can be confirmed by tapping Resonance on the Details screen. title: Rally Your Guild Members and Aim for Victory! Guild Battles Have Arrived!

context.text:
Ready your teams! The long-awaited **Guild Battles** are here! __**Duration**__ â—† Commences 4/15/2020, World Time (PST) Matching Phase: 11:00â€“12:59, World Time (PST) Battle Phase: 13:00â€“22:59, World Time (PST) Ranking Confirmation Start Time: 23:00, World Time (PST) *Guild Battle Reward Claim Period: from the moment rankings are confirmed until the start of the Matching Phase the following day. *Guild Battles will be hosted daily except on days when server maintenance will be needed.

__**Guild Battles Have Arrived!**__

â—† Only guilds with **10 or more members** can participate. Guilds will be automatically entered into the matching algorithm and paired with opponents **every day from 11:00 to 12:59, World Time (PST)**. â—† Battles with opposing guilds take place from **13:00 to 22:59, World Time (PST)**; whichever guild has earned more stars by the end of the Battle Phase will be deemed the victor. *From the start of the Matching Phase until post-battle rankings have been confirmed, the following acts are prohibited. ``` ãƒ» New members can join the guild, but they are not allowed to participate in that day's Guild Battle. ãƒ» The guild cannot be disbanded. ``` __**Prepare Your Guild for Battle!**__ Each guild member sets up an Attack Party and Defense Party to use in battle.

*Any formation changes made between the end of the Matching Phase and the end of the Battle Phase will not be applied during battles. 
 

Guild Leaders and Sub Leaders get to prioritize which members go on the defensive. 

â—† Priority Editing Period
**From after receiving ranking rewards to 11:00, World Time (PST) (start of the Matching Phase)**

*In the event that the opposing guild has fewer members than your own, members with high priority for defense will be set as the primary Defense Parties. 

The Battle Phase Has Begun! Attack the Opposing Guild!

ãƒ»** Attack Parties can do battle twice in certain situations.** ãƒ» If your Attack or Defense Party remains standing after battle, your party's HP, AP, TP, and remaining ability uses will be carried over to the next battle. *Attack Parties cannot do battle again if they are wiped out after their first battle. ``` Hint: No matter how strong an opposing guild is, if you can whittle them down, you can still claim victory! ``` ãƒ» You'll earn stars for every unit downed by attacking the opposing guild's Defense Party. ``` You'll receive personal rewards in the form of a set number of Guild Medals based on how many stars you've earned. ``` ãƒ» You can receive Guild Medals by attacking. Also, even if it looks like you're not going to win your battle, by attacking you can reveal valuable information about the opposing Defense Party to your fellow guild members, which can greatly contribute to your guild's overall victory. ãƒ» An opposing guild's Defense Party initially only displays the first unit; but once they are attacked, all units of the party are revealed. *Draws may occur due to the limitation on the number of actions that can be performed during battle, leaving both the Attack and Defense Parties remaining standing. However, in such an event, the same two parties will not carry over to the next battle. ã€€``` Hint: Coordinating with your guild members is crucial! ``` When the Battle Phase ends, the victor will be decided by whichever guild has earned more stars. Also, you'll receive Guild Medals based on you and your guild's cumulative battle performance. You can acquire more Guild Medals as your Guild League improves, so work together with your guild members to reach the top! __**Guild Battle Rewards**__

The following rewards can be acquired from Guild Battles. â—† Personal Rewards You can acquire at least one Guild Medal for participating and as many as six Guild Medals for doing battle twice during the Battle Phase. â—† Guild Rewards (distributed to all members) Every guild member will receive a number of Guild Medals based on how many stars the entire guild acquired during the Battle Phase.

        Welcome to the world of WAR OF THE VISIONS FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS!
 
Begin your journey into Ardra with the following tips!

    



    __**Complete Daily Missions!**__

Earn **rewards** and **Visiore** by taking on Daily Missions! Accumulate progress points from clearing Daily Missions to obtain **treasure chests**!


    
        __**Chapters 1â€“4 Released!**__

En route to Fennes, MachÃ©rie's carriage is ambushed by a group of bandits in Leonis. This uncannily organized bandit attack brews doubts about Fennes' integrity. MachÃ©rie absconds from her wedding with Leonis's aid. In turn, Fennes brands Leonis as MachÃ©rie's abductor and declares war. 

What will happen to the kingdom of Leonis and MachÃ©rie? Find out more in Chapters 1 through 4!
    


    
        __**Take On Beginner Quests & Challenge Missions!**__
Learn more about the game by playing Beginner Quests and Challenge Missions.

Clear Challenge Missions to get items and materials for enhancing your units.
**Challenge rewards** will be awarded when you complete Challenge Missions in a straight line horizontally, vertically, or diagonally on the bingo board.
Challenge rewards include fabulous items such as **MR+ Unit Guaranteed Summon Tickets** and **MR rarity equipment**.

    


    
        __**Form Allies! Make and Invite Friends!**__

Partner up with Companions that take the field with you during Quests.
Your Player Rank increases as you make more Friends!

You will receive a Friend Gift when you become Friends with another player. You can send and receive gifts such as **Friend Medals** to and from the Friends you make. Exchange Friend Medals for valuable items such as **unit awakening materials** and Rainbow Fragments of Thought in the Mog Shop. ```Note: Friend Gifts can be sent to new Friends from 12:00 a.m. (PST) the day after you have befriended them. ``` __**Join a Guild and Earn Various Rewards!**__

Join a guild and receive various benefits, such as Guild Statue upgrades and access to the **Barracks**.
**Guild Medals** can also be earned and sent to and from fellow guild members. Exchange these medals for **awakening materials** and other useful items in the Mog Shop.

**Enhance Guild Statues** in your guild by making offerings with specific items.
The stronger your Guild Statues, the more guild member benefits you'll receive!

Acquire **JP** and **Bravery** when you assign units to the Barracks. JP is required to enhance your units' abilities.
However, take note that the **Faith** stat of units stationed in the Barracks may decrease.

    


    
        __**Complete Quests to Acquire Various Materials!**__

Complete various Daily Quests to acquire materials such as **gil**, **EXP Cubes**, and more.
Keep a lookout for these Quests as it may be easier to collect certain materials based on the day of the week!
    


    
        __**Chocobo Expedition!**__

Send your units on a **Chocobo Expedition** and earn rewards based on the exploration location you set. Embarked units will return with EXP and various items, including rare ones such as **Fragments of Thought** or **unit shards**!

It will take some time for normal expeditions to complete; however, you can shorten the expedition duration by activating **High-Speed Expeditions** via the use of either Visiore or Expedition Tickets.
    


    
        __**Participate in Subquests!**__

Subquests will appear as you advance through the Story Quests. Complete Subquests to obtain **gil**, **Visiore**, and other enticing rewards!
    


    
        __**Make Use of Your Units' Affinity in Difficult Battle Situations!**__

When units with **high Affinity** for each other are located close together on the map, they will **receive a boost to their stats**. As Affinity levels increase, the range and effect of the stat boosts also increases.

The stats of each unit improve when they have high Affinity with nearby units. Use this to overcome difficult situations! ```
Your journey into Ardra begins now!

__**Make Sure to Backup Your Data!**__ Securing your game account will allow you to restore your data in the event of game data loss. ``` *Please note that in the event you lose your device or your account, reinstall the game data, or delete the game cache without previously securing your account, your data will not be retrievable. ``` It is **highly recommended** that players link their game accounts to their Facebook, Google, or Apple account. __**Create a Facebook, Google, or Apple ID Account**__ If you do not already have a Facebook, Google, or Apple account, you will need to create one before you can back up your game data. __**Data Backup for New Players**__ (1) A prompt to link accounts will be provided to you after going through the Language Settings, Terms & Conditions, Age Verification, and Ad Consent. (2) At the prompt, select your preferred account: Facebook, Google, Apple, or none. Apple accounts are exclusive to iOS users. ***The account-binding function "Sign in with Apple" is only available for devices running on iOS 13 or newer. In addition, two-factor authentication must be enabled for your Apple account.** (3) If the chosen account is already linked to an existing game account, you will receive another prompt. (4) Alternatively, should you choose None, you may perform Data Backup after your account has been created via the in-game Menu, followed by Accounts. __**Retrieving Data for Existing Players**__ (1) Upon launching the game, tap Continue to bring up Data Backup. (2) Select the type of account that has been linked with your game dataâ€”either Facebook, Google, or Apple. Once your data has been retrieved, your Player ID will be shown at the bottom of your screen. (3) Tap Touch to Start to proceed with your retrieved game data. __**Alternate Data Backup Method**__ (1) Tap Menu on the Home screen, followed by Accounts. (2) Select your preferred accountâ€”Facebook, Google, or Apple. (3) If the chosen account is already linked to an existing game account, you will receive another prompt. ```Notes *Game accounts can only be linked to one Facebook, Google, or Apple account at a time. ``` Thank you for your continued support of WAR OF THE VISIONS FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS!
